price: Il y a bien là un signe pour celui qui craint le châtiment de l’au-delà. C’est un jour où les gens seront rassemblés ; et c’est un jour solennel (attesté par tous).
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗ لِّمَنۡ خَافَ عَذَابَ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمٞ مَّجۡمُوعٞ لَّهُ ٱلنَّاسُ وَذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمٞ مَّشۡهُودٞ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyatan liman khāfa ʿadhāba al-ākhirati dhālika yawmun majmūʿun lahu al-nāsu wadhālika yawmun mashhūdun
